helpSupport.contactSupportContent: Email us at wisheraapp@gmail.com for technical support, bug reports, feature requests, or any questions. We typically respond within 24 hours.
helpSupport.privacyPolicyContent: We collect and use your personal information to provide and improve our services. Your data is encrypted and secure. You can access, update, or delete your information at any time through your account settings.
helpSupport.termsOfServiceContent: By using Wishera, you agree to our terms of service. This includes respecting other users, not sharing inappropriate content, and using the service responsibly. Violations may result in account suspension.
helpSupport.cookiePolicyContent: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and assist with marketing. You can control cookie preferences through your device settings.
helpSupport.communityGuidelinesContent: Be respectful, kind, and considerate to all members. Share appropriate content, respect privacy, and help create a positive community. Harassment, spam, or harmful behavior is not tolerated.
helpSupport.privacyPolicyFull:
1. Introduction

Welcome to Wishera. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service.

2. Information We Collect

2.1 Personal Information
We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
• Name and username
• Email address
• Profile information (bio, birthday, interests)
• Wishlist data and gift information
• Profile pictures and images

2.2 Usage Information
We automatically collect information about how you interact with our service, including:
• Device information and IP address
• Browser type and version
• Pages visited and time spent
• Cookies and similar tracking technologies

3. How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:
• Provide, maintain, and improve our services
• Process your requests and transactions
• Send you notifications and updates
• Personalize your experience
• Detect and prevent fraud and abuse
• Comply with legal obligations

4. Data Security

We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including:
• Encryption of data in transit and at rest
• Secure authentication and authorization
• Regular security audits and updates
• Access controls and monitoring

5. Your Rights

You have the right to:
• Access your personal information
• Update or correct your information
• Delete your account and data
• Opt-out of certain communications
• Export your data

6. Cookies and Tracking

We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and assist with marketing efforts. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

7. Third-Party Services

We may use third-party services that collect, monitor, and analyze information to help us improve our service. These services have their own privacy policies governing the use of your information.

8. Children's Privacy

Our service is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

9. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

10. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
Email: wisheraapp@gmail.com
Address: Wishera Privacy Team, San Francisco, CA
helpSupport.termsOfServiceFull:
1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using Wishera, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

2. Description of Service

Wishera is a wishlist management platform that allows users to create, share, and manage wishlists with friends and family. The service includes features for gift reservations, profile management, and social interactions.

3. User Accounts

3.1 Account Creation
You must create an account to use certain features of our service. You agree to:
• Provide accurate and complete information
• Maintain the security of your account credentials
• Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
• Accept responsibility for all activities under your account

3.2 Account Termination
We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms or engage in any fraudulent, abusive, or illegal activity.

4. User Content

4.1 Content Ownership
You retain ownership of all content you create and share on Wishera, including wishlists, gift items, images, and profile information.

4.2 Content License
By posting content, you grant Wishera a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute your content solely for the purpose of providing and improving our service.

4.3 Prohibited Content
You agree not to post content that is:
• Illegal, harmful, or violates any laws
• Infringes on intellectual property rights
• Contains hate speech, harassment, or discrimination
• Is spam, fraudulent, or misleading
• Contains viruses or malicious code

5. Privacy

Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the service, to understand our practices regarding the collection and use of your information.

6. Gift Reservations

The gift reservation feature allows users to mark gifts as reserved. Reservations are made in good faith and do not constitute a legal obligation to purchase. Wishera is not responsible for ensuring that reserved gifts are actually purchased or delivered.

7. Intellectual Property

The service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Wishera and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.

8. Disclaimers

The service is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.

9. Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law, Wishera shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use or inability to use the service.

10. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new terms on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

11. Governing Law

These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California, United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

12. Contact Information

If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
Email: wisheraapp@gmail.com
Address: Wishera Legal Team, San Francisco, CA
helpSupport.cookiePolicyFull:
1. What Are Cookies

Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

2. Types of Cookies We Use

We use the following types of cookies:
• Essential Cookies: Required for the website to function properly
• Authentication Cookies: Keep you logged in
• Preference Cookies: Remember your settings
• Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site
• Functionality Cookies: Enable enhanced features

3. How We Use Cookies

3.1 Session Cookies
Session cookies are temporary and are deleted when you close your browser. They help maintain your session while you navigate our service.

3.2 Persistent Cookies
Persistent cookies remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them. They help us remember your preferences and improve your experience.

3.3 Third-Party Cookies
We may use third-party cookies from trusted partners to help us analyze usage and provide better services.

4. Managing Cookies

You can control and manage cookies in several ways:
• View cookies stored on your device
• Block cookies from specific sites
• Block all cookies
• Delete cookies

Note: Blocking cookies may affect the functionality of our service.

5. Cookie Consent

By using our service, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy.

6. Updates to This Policy

We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Please check this page periodically for any changes.

7. Contact Us

If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at:
Email: wisheraapp@gmail.com
helpSupport.communityGuidelinesFull:
1. Introduction

Welcome to the Wishera community! These guidelines help ensure a positive, respectful, and enjoyable experience for everyone.

2. Be Respectful

Treat all members with kindness and respect:
• Be inclusive and welcoming to everyone
• Respect different opinions and perspectives
• Be considerate in your interactions
• Avoid offensive language or behavior

3. Content Guidelines

3.1 Appropriate Content
Share content that is:
• Relevant to wishlists and gift-giving
• Respectful and appropriate for all ages
• Original or properly attributed
• Helpful and constructive

3.2 Prohibited Content
Do not share content that is:
• Illegal or promotes illegal activities
• Harassing, threatening, or abusive
• Discriminatory or hateful
• Spam or misleading
• Contains personal information of others without consent

4. Gift Reservations

When reserving gifts:
• Reserve gifts you genuinely intend to purchase
• Update reservations if your plans change
• Respect others' wishlists
• Don't abuse the reservation system

5. Privacy and Safety

Protect your privacy and respect others:
• Don't share personal information publicly
• Respect others' privacy settings
• Report suspicious or harmful behavior
• Keep your account secure

6. Reporting Issues

If you encounter problems:
• Report inappropriate content or behavior
• Contact support for technical issues
• Use the reporting features in the app
• Be specific and constructive in your reports

7. Consequences of Violations

Violations may result in:
• Warning or temporary suspension
• Content removal
• Account suspension or termination
• Legal action if necessary

8. Positive Community Building

Help build a great community by:
• Sharing thoughtful wishlists
• Being helpful to other users
• Participating constructively
• Celebrating others' special occasions
• Following the spirit of these guidelines

9. Contact Us

For questions or concerns about these guidelines:
Email: wisheraapp@gmail.com
